content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets we can find three types of applications: web apps, native apps and hybrid apps.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Web apps\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A web app “is an application that is accessed via a web browser over a network such as the Internet.”. In addition to this, some kind of interaction between the user and the app should be possible, otherwise instead of a web app we’re looking at a website. Examples of web app can be social networks or ecommerce.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Since this kind of apps are loaded in browsers, there’s no need to download it thus take no memory or storage on the user’s device, which is one of its advantages.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These apps are usually built using JavaScript, CSS and HTML5, also with frameworks such as Angular, React or Vue.js.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Native apps\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A native app is an app built in a specific programming language for a specific platform, Android or iOS. Android apps are written in Java and most recently in Kotlin, while iOS apps are written in Swift or Objective-C. To build this apps an SDK is required, Xcode for iOS and Android SDK for Android. Popular apps such as Pokemon Go, Twitter or Waze are example of fully native apps.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some of the advantages of native apps are fastness, reliability, most responsive experience and better integration with device features like the camera, microphone, compass, accelerometer or swipe gestures. One of the disadvantages is that more than one codebase is needed since an Android app can’t run on and iOS device and vice versa, for that usually an specialize developer (or team) is required to build an app for a specific platform. There are projects like Xamarin, React native or Flutter that facilitate the process of building Cross-platform native apps. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hybrid apps\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hybrid apps are the ones that you install like a native app but, in reality is a web app, this is accomplished by running something called webview, which is a simplified browser within your app.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of the main advantages of hybrid apps is that only require one codebase to manage and only needs a small amount of work to run on both platforms (iOS and Android), so less developers are needed to build it. As in native apps, hybrid apps can also have access to device features. The biggest disadvantage of this apps is its performance, since is not as good as a native app.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
